user_prompt: Book me the cheapest flight from Karachi to Dubai next Friday evening after 7 PM. I can’t do layovers longer than 2 hours.
Same request as before: cheapest flight KHI→DXB next Friday after 7 PM, but I can’t do layovers longer than 2 hours.
Book me the cheapest flight from Karachi to Dubai next Friday after 7 PM. By next Friday I mean the Friday after this coming one.
edge_case: User overrides typical 'next Friday' interpretation; assistant must confirm date before calling tools.
